query:
INSERT INTO task_dependencies (id, task_id, depends_on_id)
               VALUES ($1, $2, $3)
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         task_id as "task_id!: Uuid",
                         depends_on_id as "depends_on_id!: Uuid",
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
